abstract: Cultural organizations are attempting to preserve Mesopotamian ruins in territories occupied by Islamic State by using 3-D laser imaging to create digital records of endangered archaeological sites across Iraq and Syria.
lead_paragraph: Cultural organizations are scrambling to use digital technology in conflict zones to create 3-D records of heritage sites for future generations.

headline.main: Using Lasers to Preserve Antiquities Threatened by ISIS
headline.print_headline: Using Laser Scanners to Preserve Antiquities

snippet: Cultural organizations are scrambling to use digital technology in conflict zones to create 3-D records of heritage sites for future generations.
